choices: On her way home from work
1.content:
SO! First thing's first, how shall we start?

Outside at the park?

Long day at work?

A science lab or science class even?

Or perhaps at home, kicking back on the couch?

Or resting in bed...
1.title: The beginning...

11.content:
Ahh a good day for the park!

So, where do we start from here? Is she...

Relaxing under the shade of a tree?

On the swings when her sandals or flip flops fly off?

Perhaps she made the mistake of wearing her boots on such a hot day and asks for a massage?

Or perhaps you wanted to test out some new growth device of yours?

Or other ideas if you got em.
11.title: At the park

12.content:
Now where to continue? Did she...

Have a long day at work and is walking home?

Have an ok night, walking home when she bumps into you?

Car-pooling with you after work?

Or are you perhaps sneaking behind, waiting to strike with either some sleep dart to bring her elsewhere for your fun, or a foot growth one ready to test?

Or some other ideas~
12.title: On her way home from work

13.content:
Science and feet can make some fun combos! SO, what are we looking to do?

Bigger feet?

Sweatier and Smellier feet?

Softer Feet?

Or all of the above~?
13.title: Science!

131.content:
How's about some extra choices for how this plays out...

Is it caused by a science experiment accident? Such as a spilled beaker, failed injection, potion swapped, etc etc...

Or perhaps a secret admirer? Fallowing her on her walk home, waiting for the right moment to hit her with a growth dart, or maybe get ahead and plan a fake, quincident greeting? So on and so forth...

And cause my account is free and cant make use of the other choices, there's a MORE tab.
131.title: Bigger!

1313.content:
Perhaps she got cursed! Maybe made fun of a witch or something, who put a curse on her. The next day when she wakes, though in-known to her, whenever her soles touch something (Example, the floor, in-soles of shoes or socks, hands, etc) they begin to grow!

Or maybe even a boyfreind or ex, who does something similar. Only instead, whenever her feet recive any attention they grow! For example, if someone said her feet or cute, or massaged them, or even thinks to themselves about her feet, they'd grow. Could be fun~

Again with the more tab. I'm curious though, how many growth scenarios can we get? :3
With every addon you do here, make sure to have a MORE tab! I dare you~
1313.title: More

choices: She wakes up, and and goes to grab a morning coffee in the kitchin
13131.content:
Reminder; her feet will grow upon touching ANYTHING that isn't air~


         It was a late night, Chelsea was on her way home from a wicked rave party her pal inviter her to. She had a blast full of hours of dancing! Though had accidently taken her old boots, which where a bit too small for her big delicate feet. And hours later, are feeling terribly sore. Unluckily the same day her car was at the shop...
About an hour later she grew close to home, but took a stop at a park bench, where an old lady sat too.

"Hopefully she won't mind, I really need to take these things off for a moment!"

She says to herself, as she begins to tug at her tight boots. Eventually, she gets each off with a sigh of relief, wiggling her pudgy, sweat-drenched toes to the cool air.
Though the lady beside her was not as thrilled about it. In-fact, she could smell the funk her sore feet and boots let out, even outside!

Ugh, young lady, can you please put your shoes back on? They REEK!

She grumbled. But Chelsea ignored, paying little attention to anything besides airing her tired soles, and letting them breath.
After asking a few more times, the lady got up and walked away, grumbling something... Little had Chelsea known, it was a curse! A curse that would make things worse, starting tomarrow...


The Next Morning...
13131.title: Curse of Touch

14.content:
Good! So, how do you know here?

Roommate?

Boy Friend, Girl Friend, etc?

Good/Best Friend?

Just met?

Or if you wanna be a bit on the odder side of it, brother/sister or parent?
(Not personally into the idea but, hey I don't judge I guess)
14.title: At home, relaxing

info.brief_description: Have fun with the feet of Chelsea Feisty Feet!
info.description:
Rules are simple; the main focus is her big lovely size 9 feet! Other kinks can be included (foot-growth is welcome and encouraged~)
However! Watersports/scat and macro/micro are not included.
Feel free to make them sweaty and/or smelly though.

Picture of her; https://static.f-list.net/images/charimage/19446406.png and https://static.f-list.net/images/charinline/83/4f/834f4c16afe787962441f2aed3be06...

GP May be awarded for decent posts
